name: Puzztle
description:
Puzztle is a tactical puzzle game where two players try to destroy each other's castle with units that can be recruited by moving colorful tiles and building various patterns with them. Units' strength is based on their level and type, so it is essential to keep track of your opponent's actions.

A game made as a semester project for KNTG Polygon.

CREDITS: 

Daniel Kunicki - design and code
Aga Seweryn - music
Marcin Oszczyk - graphics
Zbyszek Andrzejewski - tech support and advisory
